article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Defensive PowerCost: $800Recharge Time: 6:00Deploys a temporary Risen Monolith on the battlefieldRisen Monolith attacks ground and air targets from a long rangeCannot be repaired or rendered invulnerable, but does not require power to operateStrong vs. Infantry, AircraftLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)

Type: Defensive PowerCost: $800Recharge Time: 6:00
Requires: Inferno Tower or Antares BatteryIncreases firepower and range of all Inferno Towers and Antares Batteries for 90 secondsLeft-click icon to activate

Type: Utility PowerCost: $800Recharge Time: 6:00Requires: Synthesis VaultCloaks friendly ground and naval units for 50 secondsEpic units are unaffectedLeft-click icon then left-click on target location
